task.title: Access the Element software user interface
task.shortdesc: You can access the Element UI by using the management virtual IP (MVIP) address of the primary cluster node.

prereq.p: You must ensure that popup blockers and NoScript settings are disabled in your browser.

taskbody.context: You can access the UI using IPv4 or IPv6 addressing, depending on configuration during cluster creation.

choices.choice: IPv6: Enter https://[IPv6 MVIP address] For example: https://[fd20:8b1e:b256:45a::1234]/
IPv4: Enter https://<IPv4 MVIP address> For example: https://10.123.456.789/

step.cmd: For DNS, enter the host name.
Click through any authentication certificate messages.
